lead_paragraph: VASSALLO--Edward F. We miss you every minute of every day Ed, as do your countless friends and admirers, who have established a scholarship, a land preserve, awards and theater readings in your honor. They still post on your Facebook page everyday. Mom, Dad, Elena & Johnny 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Memorials  VASSALLO, EDWARD F

snippet: VASSALLO--Edward F. We miss you every minute of every day Ed, as do your countless friends and admirers, who have established a scholarship, a land preserve, awards and theater readings in your honor. They still post on your Facebook page everyday. Mom, Dad, Elena & Johnny 1/3
